designNotes: Power-up introduction level - extra time allows learning new mechanics
learningObjective: Test player ability to handle multiple complex tasks + introduce power-ups

powerUpTutorial.timeBoost: Adds 5 seconds to timer - use when running low on time
powerUpTutorial.slowTime: Slows duck movement for 2 seconds - use during swarm spawns
powerUpTutorial.coinMultiplier: Doubles coin value for next 5 ducks - use on small ducks
